name: A Planet of Certain Mass
description:
Love yourself, view fullscreen.  Written for My First Game Jam Summer 2017! This is a first draft. 

They built a computer the size of the solar system.

Then they built the stations, out there in the black, to maintain its ten thousand nodes. You're the doctor of Station 229-40 "Al-Biruni," beyond Neptune. Your three-year term of service is almost up. One day, you wake up one day to a missing crew. 

Good luck.
